programme.title: The closing of the San Francisco Presidio
programme.short_synopsis: The closing of the San Francisco Presidio military base is examined by Alistair Cooke.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on the closing of the San Francisco Presidio, a historic military base that has been a garrison for over 200 years.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
